When I was in the military, AJ was considered a "highly reliable" source. No US network was even ranked.  AFIK, there is really no better source for what is going on in the ME. AJ is on the ground. Even when the Bush administration was slamming AJ (less than a year after Bush commended them on worlwide television for their "fair and impartial" reporting in Afghanistan) they never quesitoned their accuracy or their facts, they just did not liek the fact that they were reporting certain things at all. 
 
 US journalists were embedded with US troops. The US military had complete and absolute control over them.
